attributes.action: Ban Gillian McKeith from Television forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hag faced, poo fiddling cargo cult scientist Gillian McKeith has been allowed to build both a career and significant fortune through the dispensation of medical and nutritional advice which many real doctors and scientist believe to flawed. I move that she be banned from television forthwith and replaced with a proper medical doctor with actual medical qualifications from a recognised medical college.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
